video.title: Taxi Brooklyn
video.synopsis: Unable to drive, headstrong detective Cat Sullivan relies on streetwise, French-born Brooklyn cabbie Leon for transportation and help solving cases.

episodes.synopsis: To avoid going to jail, taxi driver Leo Romba must partner with police Detective Cat Sullivan to investigate a series of robberies.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Leo investigate the disappearance of a famous handbag designer's hell-raising son; Leo is picked up by immigration officers.
episodes.title: Brooklyn Heights

episodes.synopsis: When one of his regular clients is beaten to death, Leo learns that the man was a holocaust survivor. Meanwhile, Cat agrees to be Leo's sponsor.
episodes.title: Cherchez les Femmes

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Leo probe the shooting death of a foster mother; Cat asks Capt. Baker to investigate the woman she believes ordered a hit on her father.
episodes.title: Precious Cargo

episodes.synopsis: A group of men open fire on a Department of Corrections van carrying prisoners -- including the only witness to the murder of Cat's father.
episodes.title: Ambush

episodes.synopsis: When the wife of the Park Slope Stalker is murdered, Cat reluctantly agrees to take the case, fearing for her own life.
episodes.title: Love Hurts

episodes.synopsis: When three handsome young men are found dead under mysterious circumstances, Leo goes undercover as a male escort to find the person responsible.
episodes.title: Black Widow

episodes.synopsis: When a man found passed out in a dumpster warns Cat and Leo of an impending disaster, the NYPD mobilizes against a potential terrorist attack.
episodes.title: Deadline Brooklyn

episodes.synopsis: When Cat and Leo learn that a shooting victim was actually a former cop who mysteriously disappeared, the CIA pressures them to drop the case.
episodes.title: Double Identity

episodes.synopsis: Cat arrests a gang member during a citywide blackout, but he manages to escape on the way to booking and shoots two officers at the precinct.
episodes.title: The Longest Night

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Leo investigate the murder of a motorcycle messenger, and Cat gets her driver's license back -- which means she won't need Leo anymore.
episodes.title: Frenchmen Can't Jump

episodes.synopsis: A mob boss plots to kidnap Leo's son and ex-wife, who are headed to New York. Meanwhile, Cat has to help Gregg prove he's innocent of a brutal crime.
episodes.title: Revenge
